jei.info.industrial_platform.platform:
A Wrench or a stick is required for adjustment
Stand besides the block with a wrench or a stick in hand to display preview
Right click to adjust Types of Platform
Right click while sneaking to choose fill the space or not
Right click with any stone to deploy the platform
jei.info.industrial_platform.fluid_pool:
Right click with any stone to deploy the infinite pool
Stand besides the block with a wrench or a stick in hand to display preview
Fluid Pools will not remove blocks above
The pool is over 10,000 blocks, which supports infinite fluid in Create
